MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work is affecting your property in the KA23 postcode area of West Kilbride. This is due to the installation and diversion of high voltage cables and we expect power to be back on by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:24am on Thursday, 22nd October 2020.
